name: Ogre
baseMeaning: A red, demonic Japanese ogre (oni) with horns, wild hair, and fangs.

contextMeanings.meaning: Referencing monsters, demons, or scary things.
Describes someone acting monstrous or mean.
Calling someone out for bad behavior.
